review: i bought this for my uncle who wanted to cut the cord with his cable. It has given him some issues one of which required him to reset the device completely. It works with Plex which is a huge plus versus Apple TV. He has done very well with using it and is not technically savvy at all. If you are a prime member it integrates with all of that wonderfully as well, including the Amazon prime pictures syncing to be viewed on your TV.

review: We've had Roku for a few months and wanted to buy something else for another TV that was cheaper. We used this Amazon stick for a couple days then sent it back. It was far more complicated than the Roku. Also, because it is a stick it is constantly loading. I guess we are just loyal to the Roku 3. It may be a great buy for someone else just not us. The return was painless and free.
